alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 12:16PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Carbon, northeastern Albany and southwestern Converse Counties through 100 PM MDT... At 1214 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from near Little Medicine School to 11 miles east of Battle Mountain to Arlington. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects and impact high profile and lightweight vehicles. Locations impacted include... Rock River, Bosler, Windy Peak, Garrett, Friend Park Campground, Wheatland Reservoir 3, Curtis Gulch Campground, Campbell Creek Campground, Little Medicine School, Laramie Peak and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Laramie Range; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range
